thread.title: Excellent Service from an Excellent Staff Member
thread.title_full: Excellent Service from an Excellent Staff Member - Review of Courtyard by Marriott New York Manhattan/Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sophie S
title: Excellent Service from an Excellent Staff Member
text: I had a great experience at this hotel because of Nicole Batista. She is one of the Guest Service Agents and was extremely helpful. She was warm and welcoming from the moment I checked in. Nicole was attentive and promptly addressed my concerns. She is one of the reasons I will be returning to this hotel for my future business trips.
